comments.author: Snacky Pants Mom
comments.content: So...did it met S's need for comfort food? Also did mini-me like it?  Sounds good to me.

comments.author: radish
comments.content: This looks awesome - i'm a big fan of anything with beans. As for the Waffle House - scattered, smothered and covered is the way to go!! I miss the Waffle House!

comments.author: parker in the house
comments.content: Just let me say that your gentle mention, honor, effort and thought about Sarina makes me want to visit your blog (or whatever you call it) again!  There are a lot of things on the net that are all about "me; I like; my fave; etc. but I love the ones like yours that graciously embrace and talk about a significant other as well as your audience.

comments.author: Anonymous
comments.content: Sorry, I WAS going to post a positive critique of your Veggie Chili Beans with Cornbread Dumplings recipe, but then I read parker in the house's response and couldn't make heads nor tail of it.  parker in the house... get off drugs!
